import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Enviar Nota de Ajuste de Nómina"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/ubl2.1/payroll-adjust-note/{testSetId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Envía una nota de ajuste para una nómina electrónica previamente emitida.

- Se usa para corregir o eliminar una nómina anterior.
- Requiere referenciar la nómina predecesora en `predecessor`.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"testSetId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"ID del Set de Pruebas."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["period","cune","number","type_document_id","resolution_number","prefix","date","time","notes","employer","worker","payment","accrued","deductions"],"properties":{"period":{"type":"object","properties":{"admission_date":{"type":"string","format":"date","example":"2019-12-01"},"settlement_start_date":{"type":"string","format":"date","example":"2021-08-01"},"settlement_end_date":{"type":"string","format":"date","example":"2021-08-30"},"issue_date":{"type":"string","format":"date","example":"2021-08-14"}}},"cune":{"type":"string","example":"0"},"number":{"type":"integer","example":100},"type_document_id":{"type":"integer","example":9},"resolution_number":{"type":"string","example":"000000"},"prefix":{"type":"string","example":"NOM"},"date":{"type":"string","format":"date","example":"2021-09-08"},"time":{"type":"string","example":"05:01:05"},"notes":{"type":"string","example":"ESTA ES UNA PRUEBA DE NOMINA"},"employer":{"type":"object","properties":{"identification_number":{"type":"integer","example":900166483},"dv":{"type":"integer","example":1},"name":{"type":"string","example":"INVERSIONES DAVAL SAS"},"department_id":{"type":"integer","example":5},"municipality_id":{"type":"integer","example":822},"address":{"type":"string","example":"CLL 4 NRO 33-90"}}},"worker":{"type":"object","properties":{"type_worker_id":{"type":"integer","example":1},"sub_type_worker_id":{"type":"integer","example":1},"payroll_period_id":{"type":"integer","example":4},"type_document_identification_id":{"type":"integer","example":3},"identification_number":{"type":"integer","example":71227069},"dv":{"type":"integer","example":5},"surname":{"type":"string","example":"GOMEZ"},"second_surname":{"type":"string","example":"LOPEZ"},"first_name":{"type":"string","example":"JUAN"},"address":{"type":"string","example":"Crr 45 # 45 -
